author: Dr15Jones
body: The member variable streamLumiStatus_ in EventProcessor is a vector containing status information for each stream. The framework needs to know how many streams are still processing a Lumi. Before, it checked the status of each item in the container. However, looking at that entry was not guaranteed to be synchronized across all threads. Adding streamLumiActive_ atomic variable allows the check to be done just by reading the atomic plus the atomic functions as a way to guarantee that the entry information can safely be read across threads. This is done by having streamLumiActive_ be written right after streamLumiStatus_ entry was changed and then read from streamLumiActive_ before reading the entry from streamLumiStatus_.
title: Provide guard for streamLumiStatus_
